column1: #Text=Pakku says : " I carved this necklace for your grandmother when we got engaged .
#Text=Gran - Gran would n't let your tribe 's stupid customs run her life .
#Text=It must have taken a lot of courage .
#Text=" Yue says : " What do you want from me ?
#Text=I just want you to know , I think you 're beautiful , and , I never thought a girl like you would even notice a guy like me .
#Text=" Yue says : " You do n't understand .
#Text=You 're a Princess , and I 'm ... I 'm just a Southern peasant .
#Text=" Yue says : " No , Sokka ... " Sokka says : " It 's okay .
#Text=You do n't have to say anything .
#Text=" Yue says : " I do like you , a lot .
#Text=But we ca n't be together , and not for the reason you think .
#Text=" Pakku says : " Not bad , not bad .
#Text=Keep practicing and maybe you 'll get it by the time you 're my age .
#Text=" Pakku says : " What do you think you 're doing ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Good to see you here .
#Text=" Zhao says : " My fleet is ready .
#Text=Set a course for the Northern Water Tribe .
